column1: boundaries and in extent. The relevant part of this section reads

The Government  Agent  shall 
in  addition  cause 
the 
land
alienated on such a permit to be surveyed by the Surveyor-
General,  and  the  extent  and  description  (by  reference  to

metes  and  bounds)  of 
the 
land  so  surveyed  shall  be

inserted 
in  such  permit.  The  Government  Agent  shall 
in
addition, cause  the  permit  to  be registered; no fee shall be
paid or recovered for such registration.
